suggest.ext-apcu: Required to use the APC cache driver.
suggest.ext-fileinfo: Required to use the Filesystem class.
suggest.ext-ftp: Required to use the Flysystem FTP driver.
suggest.ext-memcached: Required to use the memcache cache driver.
suggest.ext-pcntl: Required to use all features of the queue worker and console signal trapping.
suggest.ext-pdo: Required to use all database features.
suggest.ext-posix: Required to use all features of the queue worker.
suggest.ext-redis: Required to use the Redis cache and queue drivers (^4.0|^5.0).
suggest.ably/ably-php: Required to use the Ably broadcast driver (^1.0).
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Required to use the SQS queue driver, DynamoDb failed job storage, and SES mail driver (^3.235.5).
suggest.brianium/paratest: Required to run tests in parallel (^6.0).
suggest.doctrine/dbal: Required to rename columns and drop SQLite columns (^3.5.1).
suggest.fakerphp/faker: Required to use the eloquent factory builder (^1.9.1).
suggest.filp/whoops: Required for friendly error pages in development (^2.14.3).
suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: Required to use the HTTP Client and the ping methods on schedules (^7.5).
suggest.laravel/tinker: Required to use the tinker console command (^2.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Required to use the Flysystem S3 driver (^3.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-ftp: Required to use the Flysystem FTP driver (^3.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-path-prefixing: Required to use the scoped driver (^3.3).
suggest.league/flysystem-sftp-v3: Required to use the Flysystem SFTP driver (^3.0).
suggest.nyholm/psr7: Required to use PSR-7 bridging features (^1.2).
suggest.pda/pheanstalk: Required to use the beanstalk queue driver (^4.0).
suggest.phpunit/phpunit: Required to use assertions and run tests (^9.5.8|^10.0.7).
suggest.predis/predis: Required to use the predis connector (^2.0.2).
suggest.psr/http-message: Required to allow Storage::put to accept a StreamInterface (^1.0).
suggest.pusher/pusher-php-server: Required to use the Pusher broadcast driver (^6.0|^7.0).
suggest.symfony/filesystem: Required to enable support for relative symbolic links (^6.2).
suggest.symfony/http-client: Required to enable support for the Symfony API mail transports (^6.2).
suggest.symfony/mailgun-mailer: Required to enable support for the Mailgun mail transport (^6.2).
suggest.symfony/postmark-mailer: Required to enable support for the Postmark mail transport (^6.2).
suggest.symfony/psr-http-message-bridge: Required to use PSR-7 bridging features (^2.0).
